name: Shrinking Planet [Android port]
description:
The planet is shrinking and meteors are falling from sky, try to stay alive.

This port may come in as a surprise, and thats what it is. i ported this in roughly 3 hours and i enjoyed every moment of it! If you have an Android, this is a good game for in your free time.
Share your highscore, lets see who can get the highest!

I dedicated this port to Brackeys, a coding tutorial maker who recently left the scene. We will miss you Brackeys!

good luck, have fun!
